1/* $NetBSD: printsbuf.c,v 1.2 2012/07/22 14:27:37 darrenr Exp $ */
2
3/*

8 * Id: printsbuf.c,v 1.1.1.2 2012/07/22 13:44:42 darrenr Exp $
9 */
10
11#ifdef IPFILTER_SCAN
12
13#include <ctype.h>
14#include <stdio.h>
15#include "ipf.h"
16#include "netinet/ip_scan.h"
17
18void
19printsbuf(buf)
20 char *buf;
21{
22 u_char *s;
23 int i;
24
25 for (s = (u_char *)buf, i = ISC_TLEN; i; i--, s++) {
26 if (ISPRINT(*s))
27 putchar(*s);
28 else
29 PRINTF("\\%o", *s);
30 }
31}
32#else
33void printsbuf(char *buf);
34
35void printsbuf(buf)
36 char *buf;
37{
38 buf = buf; /* gcc -Wextra */
39}
40#endif
41
